title: Babel Rising 3D Android
description:
Play God Almighty to unleash your wrath upon Humans in Babel Rising 3D!
Phones with Adreno video cards are not available. The 3D graphics of the game aren't workin well enough with these cards.
For Galaxy S3 and the tablets, we are doing our best to find a solution that will allow you to play the game as soon as possible.
Don't hesitate to contact us at <a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="a5c6d0d6d1cac8c0d7d6d0d5d5cad7d1e5c4c8c48bd0d68b">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">

*********************************************************** 
Play God Almighty in Babel Rising 3D to prevent the Babylonians from building the famous Babel tower. Unleash your wrath and mortify these arrogant humans with your divine powers. Summon bolts of lightning, massive earthquakes, meteor showers or vengeful floods upon the Babylonians: The perfect apocalyptic arsenal.
Your divine intervention will be crucial to resist to the numerous waves of miscreant builders, blasphemer priests or damned urn carriers! Rely on tactics and strategy to achieve the solo campaign and endure an epic survival mode.
There will be no mercy!

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Master the 4 elements of fire, air, earth and water, each having specific powers.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Help your fight with passive powers and divine parchments.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Optimized controls for mobiles and tablets with a multi-touch and motion controlled gameplay to easily crush mankind.
